answers.answer: The `DATE` SQL data type has a `YYYY-MM-DD 00:00:00` format
The `FLOAT(size,d)` SQL data type is part of the numbers data types.
The `VARCHAR(size)` allows a maximum of 140 characters.
`INT(size)` data type is suitable for non-decimal numbers and can be a negative digit.
